title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: In the casting, an "L" had obviously been substituted for a " D." There is no kirkknown as Lochar in Scotland, and the chapel of Deuchar or Dochar stood hard by. The Murrays were the lairds of Deuchar; and on the principal church being removed from St Mary's, and the chapel at Deuchar suppressed, the bell seems to have been transferred from the one to the other.

title: Sheila /
author: Swan, Annie S.
snippet: 1 It seems as if you purposely made friendships and did things to vex me, Fergus. The Murrays are not your true friends. Have you forgotten that this lad and Sheila Murray are full cousins ? '
